name: Beautiful Schoolmarm
quote: “Jesse has a fully loaded six gun and shoots the bank guard three times and the teller once. Who can tell me how many bullets Jesse has left?”
abilities: Gains +1 DS for every ‘Young’ Character in the same Movie. You may discard a card from your hand to make one of your other Characters ‘Smart’ for as long as the Beautiful Schoolmarm is in your Movie.
title: West

name: Card Sharp
quote: “Say, are you boys playin’ poker? I’ve always wanted to try that game?”
abilities: Defense = 6 while holding the “Playing Cards”.
title: Town

name: City Slicker
quote: “Well, la-di-da, if it isn’t the King of England. I’d best get some tea.” “Yes, tea would be lovely, thanks.” “Ain’t you got sarcasm back East?”
abilities: While the City Slicker is in your Movie, your hand size is increased to seven.
title: Whiskey

name: Coal Mine Heiress
quote: “Whoever marries her gets the mine… shaft and all!”
abilities: Defense = 7 in the “Abandoned Mine” or “Third World Diamond Mine”.
title: Justice

name: Deputy
quote: “Sheriff! Sheriff! There’s a trouble brewin’!”
abilities: Defense = 4 if in the same Movie as the “Marshall” or the “Town Sheriff”. Deputy is considered a “Cop” Character.
title: Robbery

name: Drifter
quote: “Who are you?” “A drifter.” “Much future in driftin’?”
abilities: At any time you may discard three cards from your hand to switch your current Location with one from the discard pile (even if you have no Location). Instead of being played as a Character, the Drifter may be played as a ‘Psycho Killer’ Attack with an AS of 10.
title: Plains

name: Exotic Foreigner
quote: “Aw, come on! He doesn’t even look Chinese!”
abilities: May not use ‘Guns’. Cannot be killed in a Gunfight.
title: Star

name: Farmer’s Wife
quote: “Settle down, boys! What have I told you about shootin’ guns at my dinner table?”
abilities: Your Characters may not be involved in Gunfights while the Farmer’s Wife is in your Movie.
title: Cowboy

name: Idealistic Newspaper Editor
quote: “Stop the presses! Stop the presses! Why do I keep saying that when I’m the only one here?”
abilities: Once per turn, on your turn, you may discard a card from your hand to draw a new one from the draw pile. Doing so does not end your turn.
title: Six Gun

name: Indian Sidekick
quote: “What you mean ‘we’, white man?”
abilities: Sacrifice the Indian Sidekick to save any of your non-’Native Male’ Characters from being killed.
title: Great

name: Marshall
quote: “Everyone, I’d like to introduce the new Marshall” BANG! THUD! “Anyone know where we can get a new *new Marshall*?”
abilities: Gets double the printed bonus from ‘Gun’ Props. Marshall’s controller may make him a ‘Good Guy’ when he is played. Marshall is considered a “Cop”.
title: Wild

name: Mule
quote: “He just won’t go nowhere he doesn’t want to.”
abilities: While you have the Mule, you cannot be forced to change Locations.
title: Train

name: Old-Timer
quote: “Gun? Ha! In my day, men used to just spit lead at each other!”
title: Home

name: Preacher Man
quote: “They call this God’s Country, so you best be getting’ off his land.”
abilities: Defense = 6 vs. ‘Supernatural’ Attacks. Gains +2 DS if in the “Old Church”.
title: Noon

name: Saloon Owner
quote: “No worries, Blackie. My bartender clearly deserved to be shot, tryin’ to pour you a drink like that.”
abilities: Defense = 8 in the “Saloon”. While you control the Saloon Owner, you may stop any Gunfight by giving the Attacking player a card from your hand.
title: Death

name: Skippy the Wonder Prairie Dog
quote: “What’s that Skippy? You only live on the prairie?”
abilities: May not use Props except the “Cow Bell”.
title: Bushwhackin’

name: Stallion
quote: “This horse will move on cue, stay where I tell him, and react when I want him to. I just wish the actors were this good”
abilities: Sacrifice the Stallion to save another of your Characters from being killed.
title: Fistful

name: Steely-Eyed Stranger
quote: “You’re new here, ain’t ya?” “How could you tell?” “Your steely eyes… That and I never seen you before.”
abilities: You can give him the Trait ‘Good Guy’ when he is played.
title: Gang

name: The Prostitute with a Heart of Gold
quote: “I’m a Dance Hall Girl, dammit. At least that’s what it says on my tax returns.”
abilities: Defense = 6 while in “Miss Kitty’s House of Negotiable Virtue”.
title: Gulch

name: Town Doctor
quote: “Looks like he fell down… onto some bullets. I see a lot of that sort of thing ‘round these parts.”
abilities: Discard three cards from your hand to prevent a Character that was just killed from going to the discard pile. The Character is returned to the Movie they came from.
title: Dollar

name: Trick Shooter
quote: “Okay, now this time I’m gonna shoot blindfolded, over my shoulder, with my left hand… Hey where ya goin’?”
abilities: Defense = 12 in a Gunfight.
title: Lone

name: Wagon Driver
quote: “If the stagecoach is a-rockin’, don’t come a-knockin’.”
abilities: Defense = 6 while on the “Stagecoach”.
title: High

name: Wanna-Be Gunslinger
quote: “Here’s your first lesson, boy. You’re supposed to get your gun out _BEFORE_ I do.”
abilities: This Character may be played into another player’s Movie. While the Wanna-Be Gunslinger is alive, no other Character may be the target of a Gunfight.
title: Little

name: Wide-Eyed Youngster
quote: “Hey mister, can I see yer gun? Huh? Huh? Can I? Huh? Can I?”
abilities: May not use ‘Guns’ if in the same Movie as the “Beautiful Schoolmarm”, the “Farmer’s Wife”, or “Mom”.
title: Deadwood

name: Angry Shaman
quote: “You stole his land, gave his people small pox and aren’t going to let him build a casino for at least a hundred years; are you surprised he’s angry?”
abilities: May be played as a Special Effect to triple the AS of any ‘Supernatural’ or ‘Native’ Attack.
title: Desperado

name: Banditos
quote: “Badges? We don’t need no stinkin’ badges!”
abilities: If the Banditos are successful, instead of killing a Character from the target player’s Movie, you may remove all Props from the target Movie.
title: Spurs

name: Bank Robbers
quote: “This here’s a hold-up… well actually this here’s a Colt Peacemaker, but you get the idea.”
abilities: May use ‘Gun’ Props to boost AS. If the Bank Robbers are successful, instead of killing a Character from the target player’s Movie, you may take that player’s entire hand and add it to yours.
title: Colt

name: Bushwhackin’ Varmints out of Sergio’s Butte
quote: “We’re gonna kill you now, but we’re gonna kill you slow… aw, just shoot him in the head”
abilities: Each ‘Gun’ played with this Creature doubles their current AS.
title: Cactus

name: Coyotes
quote: “Let me guess, it ate your baby, right?”
abilities: Coyotes must kill the weakest Character (including Props) in the target Movie. If there is a tie, you get to choose.
title: Farm

name: Dastardly Villain
quote: “Mwahahahahaaa!”
abilities: If successful, this Creature must choose a ‘Female’ Character as its victim. The Dastardly Villain is considered an “Evil” Creature.
title: Sundance

name: Evil Cattle Baron
quote: “How come we can always hear but never actually see his cattle herd?”
abilities: AS = 15 if attacking a movie with a Location. AS = 20 if that Location is the “Farm House”.
title: Wolf

name: Evil Prospector
quote: “There’s two types of people. Them what work hard and find gold, and them what kill the other kind and steals the gold. Now guess which kind I am.”
abilities: If successful, the Evil Prospector may destroy the target Movie’s Location as well as killing a Character.
title: Schoolhouse

name: Ghost Rider
quote: “In the sky?” “No, right behind us!”
title: Tombstone

name: Grizzly Bear
quote: “I thought they only ate berries and honey!” “Tell you what, go take it this jar of honey and see who eats it.”
abilities: If successful, the Grizzly Bear will choose an ‘Animal’ as its victim, if one is available.
title: Eagle

name: Hangman’s Noose
quote: “The rabbit comes out of the hole…”
abilities: If the Hangman’s Noose succeeds, the Defending player may choose the victim, rather than the Attacking player.
title: Apache

name: Hired Gun
quote: “Nothin’ personal, mister. To me you’re just a dollar sign with legs.”
abilities: This Attack targets a single Character (including Props and Location). If the Attack succeeds, that Character must be chosen to be killed.
title: Ranch

name: Horde of Locusts
quote: “They ate everythin’ that wasn’t nailed down. Includin’ the nails.”
abilities: If successful, you may destroy a Location instead of killing a Character.
title: Renegade

name: Lynch Mob
quote: “Did anyone think to bring any rope this time?”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost their AS. AS = 20 if the Lynch Mob has the “Lasso”.
title: Kid

name: Maraudin’ Injuns
quote: “That’s ‘maraudin’ indigenous peoples’ thank you very much!”
abilities: They may use ‘Native’ ‘Weapons’ to boost their AS.
title: Silverado

name: Mongo
quote: “Candygram for Mongo!”
abilities: If successful, Mongo kills two Characters.
title: Creek

name: Rattlers
quote: “I am sick of all these galldurned snakes on this galldurned train!”
abilities: The victim of this Attack does not die immediately after the Attack is resolved. It will die at the end of its controller’s next turn.
title: Good

name: Run Away Wagon
quote: “Gonna paint your wagon red… with blood!”
abilities: Always succeeds on “Main Street”.
title: Bandit

name: Sadistic Governor
quote: “Can the governor really sign out a warrant to ‘occupant?’”
abilities: The Governor gains +2 AS for every Character in the Attacking player’s Movie.
title: Frontier

name: Snake Oil Salesman
quote: “I’m sure I have somethin’ that’ll cure exactly whatever it is that’s perturbin’ you, my good man.”
abilities: May be played as a SFX to draw one card at random from each opponent’s hand. May not be targeted by the “Documentary Cameraman”.
title: Dodge

name: Stampede!
quote: “Get up on top of somethin’… no, not _me_!”
abilities: AS is doubled against a Movie that has no ‘Vehicles’ or Locations in it.
title: Calamity

name: ...Up on the Ridge
quote: “What an interestin’ rock formation.” “You mean the one with the bows and arrows pointed at us?”
abilities: This Location cannot be played on its own. It must be combined with another Location.
title: Last

name: Abandoned Mine
quote: “This’ll be a good place to hole up for a while.” “Sure, as long as we’re real quiet.”
abilities: 'Gun’ Props count as DS = 0 while in the Abandoned Mine. Any player may discard four cards from their hand to cause a cave-in and kill one Character in the Abandoned Mine.
title: Stand

name: Camp Fire
quote: “He slowly approached the door and when he reached it…” BANG! BANG! BANG! THUD “He shoulda never told a ghost story to a bunch of heavily armed men. Well, let’s go bury him.”
abilities: May be combined with “The Waterin’ Hole”. ‘Supernatural’ Attacks always succeed at the Camp Fire.
title: Mexico

name: Farm House
quote: “It’s so peaceful out here in the country, a days ride from town… and the store… and the doctor… and the law… (gulp). Pack up, we’re movin’.”
abilities: “Horde of Locusts” and “Crop Circles” always succeed in the Farm House.
title: Black

name: General Store
quote: “Guns are in aisle 3, bullets in aisle 7. There’s always trouble when they’re in the same aisle.”
abilities: There is no limit to the number of Props a Character in the General Store may receive every turn.
title: Outlaw

name: Ghost Town
quote: “There ain’t nobody here!” “Nobody we can see…”
abilities: On your turn you may discard two cards from your hand to take a Character from the discard pile and put it into your Movie. Such Characters may not use Props and are discarded if you ever leave the Ghost Town.
title: Gun

name: Main Street
quote: “How come the traffic light has red, yellow and ‘draw’?”
abilities: 'Gunslinger’ Attacks always succeed on Main Street.
title: Arrow

name: Miss Kitty’s House of Negotiable Virtue
quote: “It’s the best little you-know-what in Texas!”
abilities: While in Miss Kitty’s House of Negotiable Virtue, your Characters cannot be targeted by Gunfights.
title: California

name: Riverboat
quote: “What a lovely day for a riverboat cruise… say, is that a tentacle?”
abilities: Defense = -2 vs. ‘Aquatic’ Attacks. The Riverboat is immune to “Stampede”.
title: Rifle

name: Saloon
quote: “I’d like a glass of milk… in a dirty glass!”
abilities: O your turn, one Character in the Saloon can start a Gunfight even if not carrying a ‘Gun’.
title: Paleface

name: Savings & Loan Building
quote: “I’d like to take out a loan… indefinitely.”
abilities: “Bank Robbers” always succeed at the Savings & Loan Building.
title: Man

name: Stagecoach
quote: “I don’t think that wheel’s gonna hold much longer.” “With our luck, it’ll hold just long enough to reach that cliff!”
title: Mohawk

name: Town Jail
quote: “All right, Virgil, when you sober up enough to find where I kid the key, you can let yourself out of the cell.”
abilities: Defense = +5 if you have the “Deputy”, “Marshall” or “Town Sheriff” in play.
title: Horse

name: Train
quote: “This here’s a train robbery… except that we’re not stealin’ the train, we just want all your money and stuff so really, it’s more like an ordinary stuff robbery and we just happen to be on a tr… THIS HERE’S A ROBBERY!”
abilities: “Banditos” and “Bushwhackin’ Varmints out of Sergio’s Butte” always succeed on the Train.
title: Sunset

name: Waterin’ Hole
quote: “Somebody’s poisoned the water hole!”
title: Cherokee

name: 10 Gallon Hat
quote: “A man’ll never go thirsty in a hat like that.”
title: Lawman

name: Belt Buckle the Size of Your Head
quote: “Well I’ll be! It stopped every single one of those bullets!”
abilities: Discard from play to save this Character from being killed for any reason.
title: Rio Bravo

name: Bottle of Nitroglycerin
quote: “Yeeha! That sure do pack a wollop!” “Did you just drink that?!?!"
abilities: Discard from play during an Attack for a +15 DS bonus OR discard from play at any time to destroy one Location or kill one Character.
title: Gamble

name: Cow Bell
quote: “More cow bell! This game needs MORE COW BELL!”
abilities: May be given to any “Skippy” or other ‘Animal’ Character, even if they cannot normally use Props. When on an ‘Animal’, you may discard 3 cards from your hand to stop any Creature Attack made against your Movie.
title: Bullets

name: Gatling Gun
quote: “You like gatling guns?” “Don’t know. Never gatled one before.”
abilities: On your turn you may discard six cards from your hand to kill one Character from each opponents’ Movie.
title: Saloon

name: Itty Bitty Derringer
quote: “What, you mean this little thing?"
abilities: Defense = +5 during a ‘Gunslinger’ Attack.
title: Tumbleweed

name: Lasso
quote: “If you catch me, with it, is it gonna make me tell the truth?” “Nope, but draggin’ you by it behind this wagon for a few miles probably will.”
abilities: Discard 2 cards from your hand to steal a Prop from any Character in play and give it to whomever holds the Lasso.
title: Texas

name: Peacemaker
quote: “Well, at least it’s peaceful once all the shootin’ is over.”
abilities: If the Character holding the Peacemaker dies, you may give this Prop to another Character in your Movie.
title: Alamo

name: Pine Box
quote: “I made it just a bit taller than you are now. Hangin’ tends to stretch the spine a little.”
abilities: This Prop may be played on another player’s Character.
title: Border

name: Playing Cards
quote: “I’d like one card… from the top this time.”
abilities: Discard Playing Cards from play to draw a new hand of six cards. Defense = +5 in the hands of the “Card Sharp” or the “Gambler”.
title: Maverick

name: Scatter Gun
quote: “They call it a scatter gun ‘cause when I pull it out, people scatter.”
abilities: Scatter Gun’s DS bonus still counts against ‘Swarm’ Attacks.
title: Stagecoach

name: Sheriff’s Badge
quote: “Look, it stopped a bullet!” “Yep, would’ve saved his life too… if he had eight more.”
abilities: A Character with the Sheriff’s Badge is considered to be a “Cop” and gains double the printed bonus from ‘Gun’ Props.
title: Bronco

name: Silver Bullet
quote: “Stole this from a guy with a white suit and a mask.”
abilities: Discard from play to automatically win the current ‘Gunslinger’ Attack OR discard from play to stop an “I Was A Teenage Werewolf” Attack.
title: Rattlesnake

name: Six Shooter
quote: “Are those like tequila shooters?” “This kind has a bit more of a kick.”
title: Wagon

name: Tomahawk
quote: “Me chop ‘em up real good.” “I thought you guys don’t talk like that.”
abilities: Defense = +5 in the hands of a ‘Native’ Character.
title: Frisco

name: Winchester
quote: “On a clear day, this baby can shoot Missouri from here.”
abilities: If used in a Gunfight, opponent’s DS is considered 0.
title: Fort

name: Roll the Credits
quote: “Well, the mysterious stranger who cleaned up this town is gone, so it must be over.”
title: Gunslingin’

name: Roll the Credits
quote: “Look! A convenient sunset to ride off into. I guess it’s over.”
title: Bad

name: ...The Kid
quote: “So you’re the one they call the kid, eh?” “Goo, gee, blup.”
abilities: Grants the Character a permanent +2 DS bonus and the trait ‘Young’ as long as it remains in play.
title: Drifter

name: Aces & Eights
quote: “They call that a ‘dead man’s hand.’ You know what that makes you don’tcha?”
abilities: Double the strength of one side in a Gunfight OR remove one Character from play as long as you have a ‘Gunslinger’ Character with a ‘Gun’ in your Movie.
title: Cattle Drive

name: Ambush
quote: “What’s that over there?” “How dumb do you think I… ack. Gurgle!”
abilities: Double either the AS or DS of one side for the duration of the current Attack.
title: Quick

name: Avalanche!
quote: “Avalanche! Avalanche!” “Stop yellin’!” “Or what, I might start a second avalanche?”
abilities: Destroy one Location in any player’s Movie. For every card you discard when you play Avalanche!, you may kill one Character from that Movie.
title: Wilderness

name: Boot Hill
quote: “There ain’t no such thing as an old gunfighter, son.”
abilities: Remove all ‘Gunslingers’ from play.
title: Gold

name: But Your Gun Belt On
quote: “I can’t shoot ya if ya ain’t armed.”
abilities: Take any ‘Gun’ out of the discard pile and give it to any Character in play.
title: Country

name: Cheatin’
quote: “Did you just call me what I think you called me?”
abilities: Take one card from any player’s hand or Movie. If you take from a player’s Movie, you only get the one card you specified; any attached cards are discarded. The “Documentary Cameraman” cannot target this card.
title: Land

name: Circle the Wagons!
quote: “We’ve only got two wagons. The best we can do is make an express lane.”
abilities: Add +10 DS for the duration of the current attack OR stop the “Maraudin’ Injuns”.
title: Wagon

name: Claim Jumpin’
quote: “I’ll take that deed, if you please.”
abilities: Take a Location out of the discard pile or another player’s Movie and put it into any player’s Movie, replacing their current Location if necessary.
title: Sheriff

name: Drop It!
quote: “Nice and slow there, pardner.”
abilities: Remove one Prop from play. If you remove a ‘Gun’, bank 3 points.
title: Magnificent

name: Escape Route
quote: “Pardon me, ma’am, but does this place have a back door?”
abilities: Stop one Attack.
title: Saddle

name: Feud
quote: “Mr. Hatfield, it is my pleasure to introduce you to Mr. McCoy….”
abilities: For every Character you sacrifice from your Movie, the opponent of your choice must sacrifice two. If they do not have enough Characters to sacrifice, they lose all of them.
title: Steamboat

name: Flaming Arrows
quote: “They’re lightin’ their arrows on fire! Are they allowed to do that?”
abilities: Double the AS of the current Attack and give it the Trait, ‘Native’ OR make one ‘Native’ Attack automatically succeed.
title: Lightning

name: Gold Rush!
quote: “It’s gold, I tells ya! Pure gold!”
abilities: Starting with you, every player may draw up to two cards from the draw pile.
title: Corral

name: High Noon
quote: “How about we fight at dawn – I shoot better in the mornin’.”
abilities: Each player, starting with you, chooses a Character in their Movie to participate in a Gunfight. The player with the highest DS (counting Props) at the end of the Gunfight survives. No Character is required to have a ‘Gun’ to be in this Gunfight.
title: Pass

name: Iron Pyrite
quote: “There’s a reason they call it ‘Fool’s Gold,’ son.”
abilities: Stop one Special Effect as it is played.
title: Scout

name: Munchies
quote: “A movie’s not a movie without popcorn, a jumbo soda, milk duds, jujubes, good’n’plenty, licorice…” “And adult on-set diabetes!”
abilities: Take one card from the draw pile, the top card from the discard pile and one card at random from each player’s hand. This card cannot be targeted by the “Documentary Cameraman”.
title: Colorado

name: Next of Kin
quote: “If you thought the Cincinnati Kid was bad just wait till you see the Cincinnati Kid’s Brother!”
abilities: Play in response to a Character being killed to put that Character into your Movie.
title: Ugly

name: Obligatory Bar Fight
quote: “I should have been in the mirror business.”
abilities: Play on any Movie with 4 or more Characters in it. The Character with the lowest DS is knocked out, (DS=0) until the beginning of the controlling player’s turn. If there is a tie for lowest DS you may choose which Character to knock out.
title: Along

name: One Horse Town
quote: “Okay, you get the horse on Mondays, Wednesdays, Fridays and every other Sunday in months that end with an ‘R”, I get him…”
abilities: Remove all ‘Vehicles’ from play.
title: Drums

name: Out for Revenge
quote: “You’re gonna pay fer what you did, mister.” “You ain’t got the spurs, boy!” BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! “Nope, but I sure got the ammunition.”
abilities: Play at any time other than an Attack. Take a Character from the discard pile and use them to make a ‘Psycho Killer’ Attack with an AS equal to the triple the Character’s printed DS.
title: Dead

name: Plum Loco!
quote: “Be careful Sherriff, I heard he once killed a guy ‘cuz he gave him a funny look.” “So what, lots of guys have done that.” “Yeah but the guy he killed was a circus clown!”
abilities: Add +5 AS to any Attack OR triple the current AS of one ‘Psycho Killer’ Attack.
title: Shoot Out

name: Posse
quote: “Get the boys together Zeke.” “But the boys are all dead, Sheriff.” “Then get some new boys!”
abilities: This card can’t be played by the player whose Movie has the highest total DS. Take up to 3 Characters out of the discard pile and put them into your Movie.
title: Shane

name: Range War
quote: “I’m comin’ for your cattle, rancher! Wait, what I meant was…”
abilities: All the Characters in your Movie make an attack against another player’s Movie. The AS = the combined attacking Characters DS plus Props. The winner of this attack kills all the loser’s Characters, however the attacker also loses one Character for each Character killed in this manner.
title: Jane

name: Right to Bear Arms
quote: “Flyin’ lead, hail of bullets. Just another day ‘round here.”
abilities: Take all the ‘Gun’ Props out of the discard pile, shuffle them and, starting with yourself, deal them out to each player. Each player then immediately gives the ‘Guns’ to any Characters they have in play. No Character may receive more than one ‘Gun’ from this card and any leftovers are discarded.
title: River

name: Run for the Mexican Border
quote: “As soon as we cross that border we’re safe.” “Well, the sheriff may not be able to cross the border, but his bullets can.”
abilities: Until the end of your next turn, all “Cops” have a DS of 0.
title: Butch

name: Settlers
quote: Got wood for sheep?
abilities: If you have at least one Character but no Location in your Movie you may take a Location out of the discard pile and place it in your Movie.
title: Trail

name: Shoot Out
quote: “On the count of three we all draw and fire.” “Now is that three and THEN draw or do we draw ON three.” “Somebody shoot him.”
abilities: All Attacks (including Kung Fu and Gunfights) are triple strength until the end of your next turn.
title: Seven

name: Shot Down in a Blaze of Glory
quote: “Tell my boy his Pa died with his boots on.” “Why don’t you survive, and then YOU can tell him his Pa made the other fellers die with THEIR boots on?”
abilities: Sacrifice your strongest Character from your Movie and discard any number of cards from your hand. For every two cards discarded, each of your opponents must sacrifice a Character of theirs.
title: Red

name: Sinkhole
quote: “Where’d everybody go?”
abilities: Remove any one card from any player’s Movie.
title: Marshall

name: Stand By Your Man
quote: “I just… didn’t want… you men… a fussin’ and… a fightin’… over… me… GAK, GURGLE!” THUD.
abilities: Sacrifice a ‘Female’ Character to save one of your ‘Male’ Characters from being killed.
title: Blazing

name: Stock Footage
quote: “Didn’t we already see that?”
abilities: Take any three cards out of the discard pile and play them immediately (as long as they can legally be played). This card cannot be targeted by the “Documentary Cameraman”.
title: Cattle

name: Support Your Local Sheriff
quote: “Sheriff, huh? Everybody dies sooner or later.” “The smart ones postpone it as much as possible.”
abilities: Give +2 DS to any Character or +5 DS to a “Cop” or “Police Officer” for as long as they remain in play.
title: Butte

name: The Quick and the Dead
quote: “Man, that was fast.”
abilities: Play during a Gunfight to give your Character +4 DS.
title: Posse

name: The Railroad’s Comin’ Through
quote: “That’s what they always say. If the railroad was really comin’ to every town that says it’s comin’, there’d be nothin’ but tracks all over the place!”
abilities: Double the printed value of your Location. No other player may force you to switch Locations, however they may still destroy it.
title: Big

name: They Call Me Nobody
quote: “Who shot you?” “Nobody.” “You shot yourself?!?” “No, Nobody shot me.” “Well if you’re not gonna tell me, I’m not gonna help you.”
abilities: You may remove a Trait from any Character.
title: Varmint

name: Tumbleweeds
quote: “Sure must be dull around here.” “How did you know that, stranger?” “Look at all these darned tumbleweeds!”
abilities: Force a player of your choice to miss their next turn.
title: Mississippi

name: WAH-WAH-WAH
quote: “Cool soundtrack.”
abilities: Double the printed value of any ‘Spaghetti’ card.
title: Canyon

name: Where Are the Native American Actors?
quote: “Me likem biggum wigwam in my teepee.” “Uh, we Native Americans never spoke like that.”
abilities: Add +2 DS to a non-’Native’ Character OR play on a Character to make him lose any ‘Native’ bonuses received from Props.
title: Sioux

name: White Hat
quote: “I long for the days when you could spot the jerks by their wardrobe.”
abilities: Give one Character the trait ‘Good Guy’ and a permanent +2 Defensive Strength bonus as long as it remains in play.
title: Sky

name: Wide Open Sky
quote: “A person could get lost lookin’ up at that blue sky.” “Or bitten by rattlers since they ain’t watchin’ where they’re steppin’!"
abilities: Play on a Location to give it a +5 DS while in play OR to make a Location with a printed negative DS into a DS of zero while it is in play.
title: Range

name: Wrong Place at the Wrong Time
quote: “I thought this would be a nice place for a picnic but now with that thunder I’m not so sure.” “That’s not thunder… STAMPEDE!!!"
abilities: Double the current AS of one Attack.
title: Mountain
